name: Madagascar Kartz (DS)
description:
Experience the zany characters and unique locations of the Madagascar® movies in the over the top fun of arcade style racing. Put the pedal to the metal Madagascar® style with wacky kartz, wild tracks, unique pick-ups and more! Buckle up, strap in and get your animal instincts in high gear!

Features

• YOUR FAVORITE MADAGASCAR CHARACTERS - Including Alex, Marty, Gloria, and Melman, the wacky King Julien and the crafty penguins
• KRAZY KART ACTION - High flying jumps, flips, rolls, and stunts. Special reward structure for krazy maneuvers
• HEAD-TO-HEAD MULTIPLAYER - Take on up to four of your friends
